description.zh-cn: 中国杂交水稻育种专家，中国工程院院士，美国国家科学院外籍院士。因其在20世纪60-70年代对杂交水稻品种的研究，显著提高了中国及世界各地的粮食产量，被誉为“杂交水稻之父”。
description.en: A Chinese agronomist, member of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, and foreign associate of the U.S. National Academy of Sciences. He is renowned as the "Father of Hybrid Rice" for his research on hybrid rice varieties in the 1960s and 1970s, which significantly increased food production in China and around the world.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名妇产科医生。
description.en: A renowned Chinese obstetrician and gynecologist.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议湖南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议湖南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国在1959年至1961年期间发生的大规模饥荒。
description.en: Refers to the widespread famine that occurred in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场大规模社会政治运动。
description.en: A large-scale sociopolitical movement that took place in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 通过杂交技术培育出的具有杂种优势的水稻品种，能显著提高产量。
description.en: Rice varieties bred through hybridization techniques that exhibit heterosis, leading to significantly higher yields.

description.zh-cn: 袁兴烈是袁隆平的父亲。
description.en: Yuan Xinglie is Yuan Longping's father.

description.zh-cn: 华静是袁隆平的母亲。
description.en: Hua Jing is Yuan Longping's mother.

description.zh-cn: 袁定安是袁隆平的长子。
description.en: Yuan Ding'an is Yuan Longping's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 袁定江是袁隆平的次子。
description.en: Yuan Dingjiang is Yuan Longping's second son.

description.zh-cn: 袁定阳是袁隆平的三子。
description.en: Yuan Dingyang is Yuan Longping's third son.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第六届至第十二届全国政协常委。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the 6th to 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议湖南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第六届至第十一届湖南省政协副主席。
description.en: Served as Vice Chairman of the 6th to 11th Hunan Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 袁隆平在1960年目睹大饥荒的惨状后，深受刺激，决意研究提高粮食产量。
description.en: After witnessing the devastating effects of the Great Famine in 1960, Yuan Longping was deeply moved and resolved to research ways to increase grain production.

description.zh-cn: 在文革期间，袁隆平遭到红卫兵和群众批判，其实验稻田的育种甚至被恶意拔除。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Yuan Longping was criticized by Red Guards and the masses, and his experimental rice paddies were even maliciously uprooted.

description.zh-cn: 国家科委在读到袁隆平的论文后，发公函责成湖南省科委将其列为“保护对象”并支持其研究。
description.en: After reading Yuan Longping's paper, the State Science and Technology Commission issued an official letter instructing the Hunan Provincial Science and Technology Commission to designate him as a "protected individual" and support his research.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家科委九局的工作人员，熊衍衡读到袁隆平在《科学通报》的论文并予以关注，促成了国家科委对袁隆平研究的支持和保护。
description.en: As a staff member of the Ninth Bureau of the State Science and Technology Commission, Xiong Yanheng read Yuan Longping's paper in "Science Bulletin" and paid attention to it, which led to the commission's support and protection of Yuan's research.

position.en: Director of the Ninth Bureau of the State Science and Technology Commission

description.zh-cn: 作为国家科委九局局长，赵石英发公函责成湖南省科委将袁隆平列为“保护对象”，并支持其研究。
description.en: As the Director of the Ninth Bureau of the State Science and Technology Commission, Zhao Shiying issued an official letter instructing the Hunan Provincial Science and Technology Commission to designate Yuan Longping as a "protected individual" and support his research.

description.zh-cn: 李必湖是袁隆平的助手和学生。
description.en: Li Bihu was Yuan Longping's assistant and student.

description.zh-cn: 李必湖在海南试验田发现了一株关键的野生稻雄性不育株“野败”，为杂交水稻“三系法”研究带来了决定性突破。
description.en: Li Bihu discovered a crucial wild rice plant with male sterility, named "Yebai," in an experimental field in Hainan, which brought a decisive breakthrough to the "three-line system" research for hybrid rice.

description.zh-cn: 袁隆平致力于杂交水稻的研究和推广，成功培育出三系法、两系法、超级杂交稻等品种，大幅提高了水稻产量。
description.en: Yuan Longping dedicated his life to the research and promotion of hybrid rice, successfully developing varieties through the three-line system, two-line system, and creating super hybrid rice, which significantly increased rice yields.

description.zh-cn: 林巧稚是负责为袁隆平接生的医生。
description.en: Lin Qiaozhi was the doctor who delivered Yuan Longping.

description.zh-cn: 在袁隆平逝世后，习近平发来唁电表示悼念，并委托湖南省委书记许达哲看望其家属。
description.en: After Yuan Longping's passing, Xi Jinping sent a message of condolence and entrusted Xu Dazhe, Secretary of the Hunan Provincial Party Committee, to visit his family.
